Articles.Content:
Cygnus is an unmanned spacecraft built by Orbital Sciences that resupplies the International Space Station under the CRS program, like SpaceX. The Cygnus spacecraft has successfully delivered cargo to the ISS twice, and is due to again this summer. That next flight will be the enhanced version, featuring circular solar cells and an enlarged cargo area. This is my first craft in a while, and I hope you all enjoy it!

**Craft Info:** 270 parts, 32 tons, 130 m/s of dv with more if you leach from the cargo tank.

**Craft Download:** [LINK](https://www./?jp6qn3soc8chd4j) (Mediafire)

![skyTi1M.png](http://i.imgur.com/skyTi1M.png)

Thanks for viewing!
Very nice replica! The new radiators can be used in all sorts of manner now.
Nice! I love your use of radiators!
